meanings.definition: A group of alkaloids found in plants of the genus Ephedra, used as a stimulant and decongestant.
meanings.sent1: The ephedrins in this herbal tea help to clear my stuffy nose.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes misuse ephedrins for their performance-enhancing properties.
meanings.sent3: The ephedrins in the plant must be having a dance party to keep us awake!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like ephedrins, always buzzing with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The ephedrins worked like magic, making her feel wide awake and alert.

meanings.definition: A synthetic form of these alkaloids, used in medicine for its stimulant effects.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed ephedrins to help with my low energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Some people experience side effects when taking synthetic ephedrins.
meanings.sent3: The ephedrins in the pill were on a mission to wake up the body.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm was like a dose of ephedrins, contagious and energizing.
meanings.sent5: After taking the ephedrins, she felt a surge of energy coursing through her veins.
